testcase.classname: F01_register | User can register with valid data
testcase.name: User should be able to register with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user enter a valid data................................................passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then user register to the system successfully...............................passed And user logout.............................................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_login | Users can use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: User could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email and password...............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_login | Users can use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: User can Follow using "facebook"
testcase.system-out: When click on follow us "facebook"..........................................passed Then "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" opened successfully.............passed

testcase.classname: F02_login | Users can use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: User can Follow using "twitter"
testcase.system-out: When click on follow us "twitter"...........................................passed Then "https://twitter.com/nopCommerce" opened successfully..................passed

testcase.classname: F02_login | Users can use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: User can Follow using "youtube"
testcase.system-out: When click on follow us "youtube"...........................................passed Then "https://www.youtube.com/user/nopCommerce" opened successfully.........passed

testcase.classname: F03_resetPassword | User can reset her/his password successfully
testcase.name: Success message appear after user reset her/his password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to account page...............................................passed And user choose change password.............................................passed When user enter new password................................................passed And user press on change password button....................................passed Then user changed password successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_search | Logged User can search for any product
testcase.name: User can search for product using his/her full name
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with name of product........................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_search | Logged User can search for any product
testcase.name: User could make advanced search
testcase.system-out: Given user choose advanced search...........................................passed When user choose specific category..........................................passed Then user choose manufacturer...............................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_addToWishlist | Logged user could add different products to wishlist
testcase.name: Add to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user could select a product...........................................passed When user can add product to Wishlist.......................................passed Then product added to Wishlist successfully.................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_filterWithColor | Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: User filter products with specific color
testcase.system-out: Given user go to category page..............................................passed When user select sub-category...............................................passed Then user filter products by color..........................................passed

testcase.classname: F07_selectCategories | Logged user can select different categories
testcase.name: Select random category then open sub-category

testcase.classname: F08_chooseCurrencies | Logged User can choose between currencies
testcase.name: User can choose between currencies Euro/US
testcase.system-out: When user click on currencies list..........................................passed Then user change the currency...............................................passed And currency changed successfully...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F09_selectTags | Logged user can select different tags
testcase.name: User can select tags

testcase.classname: F10_addToCompareList | Logged user can add different products to compare list
testcase.name: Add to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user select a product.................................................passed When user can add product to compare list...................................passed Then product added to compare list successfully.............................passed

testcase.classname: F11_addToCart | Logged user can add different products to shopping cart
testcase.name: User add products to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user can select a product.............................................passed When user can add product to shipping cart..................................passed And product added to cart successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: F11_addToCart | Logged user can add different products to shopping cart
testcase.name: User edit shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user open shopping cart...............................................passed When User can change product quantity in shipping cart......................passed Then User can delete product from shipping cart.............................passed

testcase.classname: F12_createSuccessfulOrder | Logged user can create successful order
testcase.name: User can create successful order
